paragraphs.title: TLDR
paragraphs.content: Hey there! Thanks for visiting my website! I'm Soumya, a creative developer and designer. My work explores the intersection of data, design, and code, pushing the boundaries of what these tools can create together. Iâ€™m always excited to chat about this space (and more things like the right way to make an iced latte) so please reach out at soumyakarwa01@gmail.com.
